casebody.data:
Florence DOYLE, et vir, Individually and as Next Friends of A.D. and D.D., et al., petitioners,
v.
TAXPAYERS FOR PUBLIC EDUCATION, et al. No. 15-556. Supreme Court of the United States June 27, 2017.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Colorado. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, *2325and case remanded to the Supreme Court of Colorado for further consideration in light of Trinity Lutheran Church of Columbia, Inc. v.Comer, 582 U.S. ----, 137 S.Ct. 2012, --- L.Ed ---- (2017).
